name: Favorite Animal
description: Go round the group, everyone says there favorite animal and why then popcorns to the next person.

name: Story round the circle
description: Create a story going around the group. Each person adds a sentence then popcorns to the next. An example starter sentence might be, You wash up on an unfamiliar beach, confused as to how you have arrived there. You hear a rustling sound coming from the bushes at the edge of the beach. You look up and see....

name: Group Counting
description: As a group try to count to 10. Rules: Maximum one number each. Order can't be premeditated. If two people speak at the same time, start again.

name: Three Wishes
description: Add gifs to a thread representing your three wishes, your colleagues then need to guess what it is.

name: Time Machine
description: Simple group discussion, if you could go back or forward in time, when/where would you go to and why.
